dialogue.text: Oh! Hello.
Ummmmm...you two must be new i'm assuming...
Welcome to Sunset Paradise!
Sunset what now?
Sunset Paradise..the city you're currently standing in.
Anywho i'm 427emerald. Although my friends call me AK. 427emerald is my Youtube \nname...heh
I'm here to make sure you have the best time of you're life!
By that I mean show you around, show you the arcade, all that good stuff.
Oh, we're not here to stay. We're just visiting.\nTrying to get away from all the drama you know?
Not staying huh? Bummmmerrr. Never the less, I understand.
Also didn't exactly catch your names earlier...
Oh, well i'm Girlfriend, and this is Boyfriend.
Yep! Where we come from actually isn't too far from here.
We just decided to look around and meet new people.
I seee. Well, anything in particular you have in mind to get your day rolling?
I'd actually like to challenge you to a rap battle if you don't mind.
A rap battle huh? Well thats not exactly my thing, but what the heck. It wouldn't hurt to try right?
I must warn you, Boyfriend is actually pretty good at this type of thing.
Well then, we'll see about that. Bring it on little one!
Alrig-
WAIT HEY!!!
